title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta until crisp. Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan. Combine everything and season with salt and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill. Cook the tomato puree with cream, add chicken, and simmer until done.
